description: It takes multiple data sets from small-angle neutron scattering experiment at different contrast conditions to synthetically use DENSS algorithm (https://www.nature.com/articles/nmeth.4581) to combine all the information from each data set. As the multiple data set contains more information than a single data, all information in the multiple data set are collectively contribute to the final single synthetic structure that represents a molecular particle structure.
name: DENSS-Multiple
